title: Enhancing Instructional Design Practical Skills: Gamification Training for Hazard Identification in Construction Sites

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of basic construction site terminology
context.additional_context: Competency enhancement program for professionals in education/teaching/learning fields

learning_goals: Learners can accurately identify five or more major risk factors at construction sites
Learners can perform risk response procedures with over 80% accuracy through gamification simulations
Learners can collaboratively derive three risk prevention strategies through team-based problem-solving
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
